name: Save new Discord messages to a Google Sheet spreadsheet.
description: Every time a new message is posted on your Discord channel, Make will automatically add that message to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZhCPBXI6irxN1aznrS9PlnsMrW205bzvbI_HdUNxoiE/edit?usp=sharing).
